Entries.Introduction: Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, never mind.$h
Entries.cropMatured_421: My name means 'field of hay', but I like to imagine it as a meadow full of sunflowers...
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: For me? Ooooh... I can't decide if I should drink it, or use it as shampoo...
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Loved: *gasp*... You got this for me? Wow, @, this is the best birthday gift ever!$h
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Liked: Awwwww, you got me a birthday gift? Well, I really like it!$h
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Gross! You got me this on my birthday? What's wrong with you!$a
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)88: $c 0.8#Is that... coconut? I love this!$h#Mmm.... coconuts remind me of warm, sunny days at the beach. When I hold one, I feel like I'm there... even when it's raining.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)421: Wow, they're beautiful! These are my absolute favorite.$h
Entries.FlowerDance_Accept: Oh... you want to dance with *me*, do you?$13^Oh? Sure! I'll dance with you!#$b#Hehe... of course. I'd love to be your partner.$h^We'll have a great time!$h#$e#Hmm... I admire your confidence. Most guys are too shy to ask me.^You look so pretty today!$h
Entries.FlowerDance_Accept_Spouse: *sigh*... My days of being Flower Queen are over... so it's a bittersweet dance for me.$s#$b#But, yes...
Entries.dating_Haley: I was waiting for you to ask me that.$l
Entries.dating_Haley_memory_oneday: You look really handsome today.$l^You look really pretty today.$l
Entries.married_Emily: Well, I guess this makes you my 'brother-in-law', huh? That's funny to think about.^Hey, I guess we're kind of like sisters now!$h
Entries.divorced_Emily: Things didn't work out between you and Emily, huh? Well... It happens.#$e#It *is* kind of awkward that you're both still living in this tiny town, though.
Entries.dating_Haley_memory_oneyear: So, what's the idea here... am I just going to be your 'girlfriend' forever...?$7
Entries.married_Emily_memory_oneweek: Is Emily settling into the farm life?#$e#You know, I was starting to wonder if Emily would ever get married...
Entries.divorced: I'll be fine on my own...$7#$e#Thanks for the memories.$7#$e#Why are you still clinging to me? Go live your own life.$7
Entries.dumped_Girls: I've got nothing to say to you!$a
Entries.secondChance_Girls: Alright, alright... I'm done giving you the cold shoulder. Just promise me you'll never, ever lie to me again.$s
Entries.breakUp: Agh!$8#$b#Oh... hmph. Beat me to it, huh? Alright...
Entries.Resort_Entering: I saw a dolphin on the way in!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: There's something about the sun that just makes me feel good.
Entries.Resort_Shore: It's strange the places life can take you... who knows what other lands are out there?
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Wow, look at how the sunlight sparkles on the horizon!$h#$b#I bet the sunsets here would make for an amazing photo.#$e#I have to remember to bring my camera next time.
Entries.Resort_Towel: Getting the perfect tan is an art form...#$e#It's kind of like toasting a marshmallow... you have to rotate the body just right.$h
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Laying out on a tropical beach.#$b#*sigh* I think I've finally found my place in the universe.#$e#But I guess Stardew Valley's not such a bad place either!$h
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: Emily's friend had this swimsuit shipped to me from all the way out in Zuzu City.#$e#City fashion is on a whole different level, isn't it?$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: I painted my toenails blue to match the sea. What do you think? *wiggle* *wiggle*$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus made a cute, fruity drink just for me!$h
Entries.Resort: This is such a perfect beach. I'd stay here forever if I could!
Entries.Event_clean2: NO!! I'm not going to do it!$a#$b#You guys are both stupid!%fork$a
Entries.Event_clean3: She should take the 'high road'? What's that supposed to mean?$u#$b#You think I'm being a baby, huh?%fork$a
Entries.Event_jar1: Great, then you shouldn't have any problem opening this jar for me!$h
Entries.Event_jar2: Oh... you aren't? Hmmm...$s#$b#Well could you try opening this jar for me anyways?
Entries.Event_darkroom2: Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos.
Entries.Event_darkroom5: Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos.
Entries.Event_beach1: No, you won't! This bracelet was passed down to me by my great-grandmother!$a
Entries.Event_beach2: *sigh*$s#$b#...Maybe it'll wash up on another shore. I can't bear to think of it at the bottom of the ocean.$s
Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. But not anymore! He's immature.
Entries.Event_room2: What? That sounds fun, but I wouldn't want to leave Stardew Valley right now...
Entries.eventSeen_14: It was fun taking pictures, but I had to shower for two hours to get the mud out of my hair!$h
Entries.eventSeen_13_memory_oneweek: %Haley greets you with a smile. You notice that she's wearing her Great-Grandma's bracelet.
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_oneweek: Wow, looks like someone's read the latest issue of 'Super Fashion Girl'... muddy boots are totally in right now!$h
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_twoweeks: My parents sent another postcard... I guess they're in the middle of a cruise down the Gem Sea Coast.#$e#They said me and Emily could join them at any point, but let's be honest... who wants to go on vacation with their parents?
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_oneweek: The other day, Emily baked something called a 'squirrel loaf'...$u#$e#How'd it taste? Um... well, if my tail was a little bushier I probably would've loved it.$h
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_twoweeks: Did you see last night's episode of 'Tears'? *sob*... I can't believe Kyle and Amy broke up...$s
Entries.GreenRain: I don't think I've ever set foot in this place. It's actually kind of cozy!$h#$e#Oh, I'm not worried about the rain. I'm sure it'll pass.
Entries.GreenRain_2: Wake me up when there's a pink rain... Or better yet, a pink cake rain!
Entries.Mon: This town is so small. It sucks.$u#$e#I have to drive, like, twenty miles to buy any decent clothes.$s#$e#That's why I usually just order online.#$e#What?
Entries.Mon6: I used to complain about this town being so small, but I've grown to like it.#$e#If it was much bigger it wouldn't feel like a community.
Entries.Tue: Nice shoes.^Nice makeup.#$b#Are those made out of plastic?^Or wait... Are you even wearing any?#$e#I'm bored.
Entries.Tue2: I wonder if any nice shells washed up on the beach this morning?#$e#This isn't the best time of year for shells, though.
Entries.Tue8: I picked up a ton of trash yesterday when I was out taking nature photos.#$e#I hope you're not just leaving used diapers around in the woods...$13#$e#Either that, or someone else is a big baby and they're trying to hide the evidence.
Entries.Wed: The only thing I like about this town is the beach.$u
Entries.Wed4: I'm glad that the flowers are starting to bloom.#$e#Those pink ones smell so good.$h
Entries.Wed8: There are only two things I like about this town.#$b#One of them is the beach.#$e#The other one is a secret! *giggle*$h
Entries.Thu: #$1 HaleyClothes#I've decided I am going to organize my clothes today. I'll have to throw out all of last year's styles to make room for the new ones!#$e#*sigh* I could really go for a cupcake right now.#$e#Do you need something?
Entries.Thu6: I cooked dinner last night. It actually turned out okay!#$e#But I did make a huge mess in the kitchen...
Entries.Fri2: Don't you get tired of running around on that farm all day, or whatever it is you do?#$e#I couldn't stand getting all dirty like that.#$e#You probably get a nice tan, though.
Entries.Fri6: I need to find some kind of hobby other than shopping.#$e#I've decided I want to expand my horizons.#$e#Maybe I should learn to play the mini-harp?
Entries.Fri10: @, can we go on a camping trip someday?#$e#The most exotic place I've been is Zuzu city.
Entries.Sat: I'm feeling an urge to go shopping. Ugh! I wish there was a mall here.
Entries.Sat8: #$1 haleySeagull#Yesterday I found a seagull with her wing caught in a net. I set her free, of course. She looked so helpless, the poor thing.$k$s#$e#You know, I should probably start exercising more... this youthful metabolism won't last forever.
Entries.Sun: My sister is so weird. Sometimes I wonder if we're actually related.$u
Entries.Sun6: I'm thinking about donating a bunch of clothes... I must have a hundred pairs of shoes.
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going to get such a nice tan this summer.
Entries.summer_Mon6: I should start reading some books instead of magazines.#$e#It's good to learn things, isn't it?#$e#I only ever look at the pictures.
Entries.summer_Tue2: Do you wear those clothes every day?
Entries.summer_Tue4: $p 47#Hey I found this new tool to open jars with. So you won't need to help me anymore.$h|There's not a cloud in the sky today.$h
Entries.summer_Tue8: I guess living in the country isn't so bad.#$e#If I lived in the city I might start to miss all the trees.#$e#@, I think I've been hanging out with you too much.$h
Entries.summer_Wed: Um... Yes?#$e#I didn't hear you, I'm thinking about something else.
Entries.summer_Wed4: It's so hot today!#$e#I wish I had some ice cream.$s
Entries.summer_Thu: If you stay in the sun a lot it'll make your hair lighter.#$e#It's a good thing to know!
Entries.summer_Thu6: If you stay in the sun a lot it will make your hair lighter... But you don't want to get sunburnt, either.#$e#I just want a healthy amount of sunlight. Everything in moderation, right?
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alex is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.summer_Fri4: I spent 3 hours practicing my signature today.#$e#I guess that's pretty silly, huh?
Entries.summer_Sat: Farming sounds so boring...#$q 42/43 summer_Sat_old#What do you even do all day?#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Care for plants#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Explore the caves#$r 43 -10 summer_Sat_13#Snoop around in your room#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Dig for treasure
Entries.summer_Sat_old: #$p 43#Hey, you better not be snooping around in my room anymore!$a|But I guess it could get you in pretty good shape.
Entries.summer_Sat_12: Hmm... sounds like a lot of work.
Entries.summer_Sat_13: What? You'd better not be doing that!$a
Entries.summer_Sat6: It seems like a good day to go swimming.
Entries.summer_Sun: Emily usually cooks dinner... But she makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my sister for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, Emily's not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell her I said so.
Entries.summer_10: Do you have baby bunnies on your farm? Bunnies are SO cute! <
Entries.fall_Mon: It's gross when all these fallen leaves get slimy.
Entries.fall_Mon6: $p 48#Did I ever tell you I found another one of my great-grandma's bracelets in the attic?|See this bracelet? It belonged to my great-grandmother.#$e#She was a really interesting lady.
Entries.fall_Mon10: @, I'm happy to see you today.$h
Entries.fall_Tue: Hmm... Something smells weird...#$e#You've been working on the farm, huh?
Entries.fall_Tue2: Something smells earthy...#$b#Oh, right. You work on a farm.
Entries.fall_Tue8: I'm starting to like the smell of dirt. Isn't that weird?#$e#I think it's because you're around all the time.$h
Entries.fall_Wed: Oh, hi. Did you want something?
Entries.fall_Wed4: If you're ever bored, come say hi.
Entries.fall_Thu: I feel the urge to go shopping. *sigh*
Entries.fall_Thu6: Shopping just doesn't sound as fun as it used to.#$e#What's happening to me?#$e#Hmm...
Entries.fall_Thu8: Hi, @!~$11$#$e#Hmm... Wanna go diaper shopping together?$4#$b#I bet I could help you pick out some good prints.$1
Entries.fall_Fri: Is that a grass stain on your knee?#$e#Sorry, I'm allergic to grass.
Entries.fall_Fri4: You look like you've been doing a lot of hard work.#$b#Why don't you take the rest of the day off?
Entries.fall_Sat: It's too cold to go to the beach anymore.#$q 44 fall_Sat_old#*sigh*...what do you think I should do today?#$r 44 10 fall_Sat_12#Watercolor painting#$r 44 20 fall_Sat_12#Relax and read a magazine#$r 44 -30 fall_Sat_13#Stop being a selfish crybaby
Entries.fall_Sat_old: I'll probably take a nap later.
Entries.fall_Sat_12: Hmm... That's a pretty good idea, actually.
Entries.fall_Sat_13: Get away from me, you stupid jerk.$a
Entries.fall_Sun: I've never been to the forest. It's muddy and I could get a blister on my foot.
Entries.fall_Sun6: I've never been to the forest, you know.#$e#It might be interesting to explore it some day.
Entries.winter_Mon: I want to move somewhere warmer.
Entries.winter_Mon8: I wish it were warmer here in Stardew Valley.#$e#I could move somewhere else, but...
Entries.winter_Tue: Hi. Do you need something from me?#$e#...
Entries.winter_Tue2: Your name is @, right?#$e#I keep forgetting.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hi @.#$e#Is anything exciting happening on your farm?
Entries.winter_Wed: I wish someone would bring me a peppermint coffee.$s#$e#Don't even bother, I know you won't be able to make one.
Entries.winter_Wed6: I think I'm starting to realize that clothes aren't the most important thing. Right?#$e#I still like clothes, though. I mean, what's wrong with expressing yourself a little?
Entries.winter_Thu: I'm going to start writing a list of all the clothes I need for next spring.
Entries.winter_Thu6: Maybe I'll donate some of my skirts to a charity this spring.#$e#I mean, I do have over 1,000 skirts.$h#$e#...what?
Entries.winter_Fri: Do you have a pony on your farm?$h#$e#Oh. That's disappointing...$s
Entries.winter_Fri8: Do you think you'll ever have a pony on your farm?
Entries.winter_Sat: The only good thing about winter is that I get to sleep more.#$e#I like at least 10 hours of sleep every night.
Entries.winter_Sat8: I'm glad you have less work to do in the winter.#$e#It must be nice to have a break, huh?
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to Alex for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alex could you tell him I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun10: @, you look rugged today. I like it.^@, you look pretty today.#$e#...$h
Entries.winter_9: Hmm. What brand is your shirt?#$e#Oh. Um, never mind.

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning! Did you sleep well?$h#$e#I think I might break out the old camera today... the lighting is just perfect.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, dear! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#I know you're busy with your work. I'm here to support you in any way I can!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep okay? You were snoring a little.$h#$e#I've got some chores to do in here. Have a good day.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm glad I've learned to enjoy cleaning! The house gets dirty very easily.$10#$e#It's satisfying to get everything squeaky clean.#$e#Can I have a kiss before you leave?$11
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, dear. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll be thinking of you. <$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Haley: I always feel happy on a sunny day.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Wow, you look like you did a lot of work today.#$e#Now you should just relax and kick back for the night.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home.#$e#I get kind of scared alone at night.$s#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work for the day? I'm ready to have some fun.$h#$e#But if you're tired I understand.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my chores. Now we can spend some time together.$h#$e#So, tell me about your day.$l#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Haley: You look like you've been working hard, dear. Let me help you de-stress.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I've changed a lot over the years, but I still prefer sunny weather.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Sometimes I daydream about our retirement... relaxing on the sunny beaches of the Fern Islands!#$e#Do you ever think about the future, @?
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I got up early and baked something sweet for you! [223 234 211 651 731]#$e#I know you're strong, but you still need to eat well to stay at your best!$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I can't go outside today... my hair will go limp. Forgive me, dear.$s#$e#I want to look my best for you.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Are you going out in this weather? Just make sure to wipe your boots on the way back in, honey.#$e#I'll just stay here and do some housework.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Haley: Oh no... If this weather keeps up I'll get so pale.$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Oh, I'm glad you're back. It's so cold in here by myself... Are you almost ready to shut off the lights?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I hope it's nice and sunny tomorrow morning. Too much rain can make me moody.$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope Emily isn't too lonely all by herself. I should visit her again soon.$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Rain is horrible for a photographer. The lighting is awful, and you can't go outside without ruining your equipment!$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made a hot meal for you, honey. Lots of spice, just how you like it. Enjoy! [727 231 207 199]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: I never thought I'd say this, but the country lifestyle really suits me.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Haley: Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're home. I was starting to get kind of lonely.$l
Entries.spouseRoom_Haley: #$c .5#Go ahead and start your day, honey. I'm just putting on my make-up.#$e#Have any plans for the day?
Entries.Outdoor_0: I always feel best when I'm outside, breathing fresh air.#$b#Don't get me wrong, your grandpa's old cottage is very nice! But nothing beats this beautiful landscape.
Entries.Outdoor_1: We've got to make sure the farm is cute! That might be important... right, honey?
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: $query !SEASON winter#*phew*... Is it a bit warm and muggy out here? ...Or did I just pee again?$1|Brr... Oh my god, it's so chilly, I can see my own breath!$8#$e#...*gasp*!$8#$b#...Hey, @...$13#$b#Check this out.$11#$b#%Haley lifts her winter coat to reveal the bulge of her diaper beneath her pants.#$b#%For a moment, you're not sure what she's trying to show you, until a little cloud of steam suddenly starts to trail from her crotch.#$e#Hehe... That was fun.$4
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.Outdoor_Haley: $query !SEASON winter#Looks like a good day to work on my tan, don't you think, sweetheart?|*shudder* Ugh, I was gonna try and get some sunlight, but I'm literally freezing my butt off out here!$12#$b#Brr.. M-Maybe I need another layer of diapers...$12
Entries.funLeave_Haley: I'm going to socialize in town for a bit today.
Entries.funReturn_Haley: It was nice seeing everyone in town. Did you have a good day, dear?
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today?
Entries.OneKid_1: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?
Entries.OneKid_2: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.OneKid_3: Isn't it strange? I'm not used to being a mommy...
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. They were hungry!
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_3: A big house, two kids, and a beautiful plot of land. I'm not sure what else I could ask for.
Entries.Good_0: I felt like I had no direction in life before I met you. Now I have exactly what I want.$l
Entries.Good_1: You know, I always had a feeling we'd be together some day.$l
Entries.Good_2: Are you enjoying the married life, @?#$e#I am.$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today!$l^Wow, you look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_4: This place is my home now... I'm happy here.$l
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune!$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Entries.Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l
Entries.Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.$s
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.Neutral_2: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
Entries.Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_4: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money, @?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.spring_1: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of sunny weather to look forward to. I'm excited.
Entries.spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
Entries.summer_3: Sorry if I don't look my best... the air is just so humid that my hair doesn't hold up too well.
Entries.summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies and ants... yuck.$s
Entries.fall_1: Fall is kind of sad for me... everything is dying.$5
Entries.winter_2: For some reason, the snowy weather gives me cravings for pink cake...
Entries.winter_14: My skin feels so dry in this weather.
Entries.spring_Haley: Aren't you glad winter's over, honey? Things seem more hopeful now.
Entries.summer_Haley: I love watching the fireflies on a hot summer's night. It's the closest I'll ever come to visiting the stars.
Entries.fall_Haley: Even though I prefer summer, fall might be the best season to take pictures. Those long, low shadows...
Entries.winter_Haley: I was just thinking about the time you helped me open a jar of pickles. Remember that?$h#$e#We've come a long way since then.$l
